title.rendered: Relaxo Foundation’s Collaboration with Smile Foundation For Accessible Healthcare

content.rendered:
Relaxo Foundation provides primary healthcare to low-income families

Since 2017, Relaxo Foundation and Smile Foundation have teamed up to bring primary healthcare services to underserved communities in Bhiwadi and Tijara. Together, they’ve transformed access to healthcare for families across 14 villages, with a strong focus on helping women and children. The project has run an impressive 2,433 mobile health clinics, reaching a staggering 97,289 people with daily OPD services. Beyond consultations, the initiative includes critical interventions like point-of-care tests, ANC/PNC checkups, and referrals to higher health facilities. With a blend of health education, community engagement, and capacity building, this partnership is making a real difference in the lives of these communities.
